A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Director of this movie must have not watched the previous movie. The writers of this garbage never watched a Star Wars movie or at least never cared about continuity. I left this movie shocked. I went to see The Force Awakens three times in the theater but once is enough of this hot mess. I wonder if J.J Abrams stole Rian Johnson's girlfriend and this movie is the only way to get back at him.
